title.rendered: Blockchain Conferences USA: Important Events for Business Leaders

content.rendered:
[vc_row row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][vc_column_text]Many new events are being prepared in the world of cryptocurrencies. Blockchain conferences in the USA are a great way to learn something new and valuable about this revolutionary technology. In this article, we’ll discuss some of the major blockchain conferences in New York, Los Angeles, and other big cities.

U.S. Blockchain Conferences to Attend in 2018

Blockchain technology, which allows the storage of transaction data, has broken into the market swiftly. Today, everyone knows about it, and the prospects for its use are discussed not only by businesses but also by states.

2018 is going to be full of various blockchain events. This year, it will be possible to attend the brightest cryptocurrency conferences, which will help you get real projects, sell your ideas, and perfect your own business.

There are several major blockchain events that cannot be missed this year.  The main blockchain conference in 2018 in the USA are:

Bitcoin, Ethereum & Blockchain Superconference II

September 14th to 16th, 2018

Dallas, Texas

The main goal of this USA blockchain conference is to explore the combination of blockchain technology with other innovative technologies in a new, revolutionary way which, just weeks ago, was considered impossible.

With over 1,000 prospective visitors, 70 exclusive speakers, and 100+ representatives from Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other blockchain companies, this conference will be a remarkable occasion and a useful practice for everyone who attends. The hottest themes of the season are being prepared for discussion. The brightest minds of the industry will gather at the Kay Bailey Hutchison Dallas Convention Center, hoping that blockchain technology will significantly improve the quality of people’s lives. The conference will present many unusual blockchain use cases in the business and economic sectors.

DISTRIBUTED

July 19th to 20th, 2018

San Francisco, California

The blockchain event topic is discovering new tendencies and ideas to empower the most advanced projects in the cryptocurrency business.

This blockchain conference will be held on Powell Street in San Francisco and will feature 45 highlighted speakers and uniting investors, entrepreneurs, and journalists from all over the world. Over the course of two days, recognized specialists and cryptocurrency authorities will discuss decentralization and the latest technical concepts coming to the blockchain.

2ND ANNUAL FINTECH WEEK: NEW YORK 2018

July 31st – August 2nd, 2018

Times Square, New York, NY

Main topic: investigating blockchain technology from a global perspective and discussing investments, insurance, cryptocurrency market regulation, and banking.

The Fintech Week New York blockchain conference is considered one of the most significant events of 2018. Organizers plan to investigate financial technologies and prospects for using blockchain in banking and other spheres of activity, focusing on Fintech innovations. The event will feature 30 speakers, bringing together capitalists, great banks, advisors, startups, universities, administration, and blockchain pioneers.

World Crypto Con

October 31st – November 2nd, 2018

Aria Hotel and Casino – Las Vegas, Nevada

The main issue of this blockchain event is tracking a huge amount of data and facilitating the search for real revenue in blockchain projects and crypto assets.


With over 3,000 expected attendees, 150+ exhibitors, and 30 keynote speakers, this event will attract leading investors and experts in the field of blockchain from around the world. Considering the theme of the conference, it is probably one of the most interesting events, created to inspire innovative cryptocurrency projects to collaborate and investors to invest.

Crypto Invest Summit

October 22nd to 24th, 2018

LA Convention Center

The main topic of this USA blockchain conference is cryptocurrency investment opportunities.

15 authoritative speakers will take part in the event (and more will be announced soon). Bringing together leaders of the industry, this conference promises to answer all questions about why investing in cryptocurrency is a great idea and why blockchain technology is a huge topic this year while providing an analysis of its impact on the world.

CryptoEconomics Security Conference

October 15 to 16, 2018

UC Berkeley, Pauley Ballroom

Another great USA blockchain conference about cryptocurrency economic security.

This blockchain event will investigate the economic safety details of blockchain protocols, such as game theories, impellent design, device design, and market design, together with other themes connected to cryptocurrency economic safety. The problem of fostering cooperation between researchers and practitioners in this field will also be discussed. About 35 keynote speakers are going to share their knowledge to help all interested in cryptocurrency investments understand the blockchain technology and the benefits of its use.

3rd Annual Blockchain Conference

July 26th – 27th, 2018

George Washington University, Washington, D.C.

The main topic of this blockchain event is discussing the dynamic evolution of blockchain technology in financial services, media, logistics, charity, government, etc.

This is the 26th blockchain conference organized by Fintech Worldwide, Ltd. Bringing together finance industry leaders, venture capitalists, and startups to converse about the upcoming token regulation system, this event promises to be informative and educational. Top-tier cryptocurrency experts will share their experience and knowledge in the field in order to contribute to its development.

Blockchain Health Summit Trade Show

Washington, D.C.

August 14th, 2018

The main theme of this USA blockchain conference is altering the health industry via blockchain.

The goal of this blockchain event is to outline the main benefits of incorporating distributed ledger technology within the healthcare industry. More than 40 speakers have already been announced, and more are coming soon. This conference will describe how blockchain can revolutionize the health sector, bringing transparency, efficiency, and safety. All interested in the blockchain technology will have the opportunity to meet the world’s leading experts and learn a wealth of operating secrets from them.

Blockchain East Summit + Trade Show

October 8th to 10th, 2018

Wyndham New Yorker, New York

Main topic: exploring the business of blockchain.

If you are looking for something special to experience, consider attending this event. All chosen speakers have actual experience in implementing blockchain apps in different spheres, such as government, defense, energy, banking, insurance, and many others. Hundreds of experts from around the world were interviewed to speak at this New York blockchain conference, but only the best were picked. They are ready to share their knowledge with anyone who’s interested in enhancing company operating strategy, organizing long-term goals, and learning about blockchain technology use cases and proof of concept.

Blockchain Opportunity Summit

December 4, 2018

The Offices of Morrison & Foerster, 250 W 55th St, New York

This USA blockchain conference main theme is integrating blockchain to enhance contracts, financial transactions, identity management, and other aspects of the business.

More than 45 speakers will unite in this conference to present latter-day blockchain technology upgrades, solutions, and tools. Distributed-ledger technology specialists and early adopters will teach blockchain enthusiasts valuable lessons about how to apply it to their business operating model.

Once you decide to attend one of these events, don’t forget to purchase your ticket in advance. The blockchain theme is the hottest one today. Thousands of people wish to attend these meaningful events to learn about cryptocurrency and blockchain.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
